meanings.sent1: The loud music was annoying to my ears.
meanings.sent2: The constant buzzing of the fly was annoying everyone in the room.
meanings.sent3: It was quite annoying when the pen kept rolling off the table.
meanings.sent4: Her persistent cough was as annoying as a dripping faucet.
meanings.sent5: The repetitive sound of the alarm clock was incredibly annoying.

meanings.definition: To disturb or bother in a way that displeases.
meanings.sent1: Please do not annoy the cat while it's sleeping.
meanings.sent2: The siblings always find a way to annoy each other during car rides.
meanings.sent3: He would annoy his friends by telling the same joke over and over.
meanings.sent4: The constant beeping of the microwave began to annoy everyone in the office.
meanings.sent5: The dripping faucet would annoy her to the point of calling a plumber.
